classRec.name: GAdjustColor
classRec.description: 亮度,对比度,饱和度,色相
classRec.author: bright

method.name: layout
method.description: 根据父容器尺寸进行布局

method.name: GZipDecoder
method.param: zipFile zip文件的二进制数据

method.name: addZipFile
method.description:
增加文件到zip实例，此方法为new Zip(zipFile)的替代方法。
如果多次调用此方法,zipFile中相同文件名的文件将被复盖
method.param: zipFile zip文件的二进制数据

method.name: getFileNameList
method.description: 取得zip中的文件名的列表

method.name: getFile
method.description: 通过文件名取得解压缩后的文件的二进制数据

classRec.name: GLogger
classRec.author: bright
classRec.example:
<listing version="3.0"> 

	 GLogger使用示例:

	 GLogger.addAppender(new TraceAppender());

	 GLogger.setLevel(Level.INFO);

	 GLogger.debug("this is a debug!");

	 GLogger.info("this is a info!");

	 GLogger.warn("this is a warn!");

	 GLogger.error("this is a error!");

	 GLogger.fatal("this is a fatal!");

	 </listing>

method.name: isKeyDown
method.description: 当前状态是否为按下状态

method.name: getActive
method.description: 获得指定键码的激活状态

method.name: setActive
method.description: 设置指定键码的激活状态

method.name: lastKey
method.description: 获得最后按键，用于连按相同键

classRec.name: GHLine
classRec.description: 水平线-可用于出生线配置
classRec.author: bright

method.name: getRandomPoint
method.description: 获得水平线上的随机点

method.name: toString
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">
var hline:HLine=new HLine(10,10,100);
trace(hline.toString()) // 输出"x=10,y=10,width=100"
</listing>

classRec.name: GObjPool
classRec.author: bright
classRec.example:
<listing version="3.0"> 

	 GObjPool对象池使用示例:

	 var pool:GObjPool=new GObjPool(Point);

	 var point:Point=pool.borrowObj(100,100);

	 trace(point.x,point.y);

	 pool.returnObj(point);

	 </listing>

classRec.name: GMp3Loader
classRec.description: Mp3文件加载器-只允许包内访问
classRec.author: bright

classRec.name: GCsvLoader
classRec.description: csv文件加载器-只允许包内访问
classRec.author: bright

classRec.name: GJsonLoader
classRec.description: Json文件加载器-只允许包内访问
classRec.author: bright

method.name: load
method.param: onLoaded 加载完成回调函数
onFailed 加载失败回调函数

method.name: getAlphaColor
method.description: 实际显示颜色 = 前景颜色lpha + 背景颜色1-Alpha)

method.name: cutAlphaBD
method.description: 切掉透明像素,释放源图，并重算偏移

method.name: encodeBD
method.description: 使用选定的压缩程序算法压缩此 BitmapData 对象，并返回一个新 ByteArray 对象。

classRec.name: GBinaryHeap
classRec.author: bright
classRec.example:
<list version="3.0">

	 var bh:GBinaryHeap=new GBinaryHeap();

	 bh.comparse=function(source:int,target:int){

	     return source-target;

	 }

	 bh.push(3);

	 bh.push(1);

	 trace(bh.shift()) // 输出1

	 </list>

method.name: getAt
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:HashMap=new HashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key","value");

		 var result:String=hashMap.getAt(0);

		 </listing>

method.name: getBy
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:GHashMap=new GHashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key","value");

		 var result:String=hashMap.getBy("key");

		 </listing>

method.name: isEmpty
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:HashMap=new HashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key","value");

		 trace(hashMap.isEmpty) // 输出 flase

		 </listing>

method.name: removeBy
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:HashMap=new HashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key","value");

		 var index:int=hashMap.removeBy("key");

		 </listing>

method.name: toArray
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:GHashMap=new GHashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key","value");

		 trace(hashMap.toArray()) // 输出["value"]

		 </listing>

method.name: keys
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:HashMap=new HashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key","value");

		 trace(hashMap.keys); // 输出["key"]

		 </listing>

method.name: randomValue
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:HashMap=new HashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key1","value1");

		 hashMap.put("key2","value2");

		 trace(hashMap.randomValue) // 输出"value1"或"value2"

		 </listing>

method.name: size
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:HashMap=new HashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key","value");

		 trace(hashMap.size); // 输出1

		 </listing>

method.name: values
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var hashMap:HashMap=new HashMap();

		 hashMap.put("key","value");

		 Logger.debug(hashMap.values); // 输出[debug]{"key","value"}

		 </listing>

method.name: clear
method.description: 清除此本地对象中的所有数据

method.name: getBy
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">
var lso:GLocalSO=new GLocalSO("game")
trace(lso.getAt("key")); // 如果flush成功则输出"value"
</listing>

method.name: setAt
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		 var lso:GLocalSO=new GLocalSO("game");

		 lso.setAt("key","value");

		 lso.flush();

		 </listing>

classRec.name: GGridBlock
classRec.description:
每2位存储一个标识,每字节存储4个标识
0 通路
1 障碍
2 透明
3 保留
classRec.author: bright

classRec.name: Game
classRec.author: bright

classRec.name: GPreloader
classRec.description: SWF自加载 用法：在需要实现自加载的类声明前加上[Frame(factoryClass="gear.core.GPreloader")]
classRec.author: bright

method.name: adjustColor
method.description: 调整亮度,对比度,饱和度,色相

method.name: insertFrames
method.description: 修改播放中的帧，插入帧序列

method.name: dirs
method.description:
0 无方向
1 两方向需翻转
2 两方向不翻转
3 四方向需翻转
4 四方向不翻转
5 八方向需翻转
8 八方向不翻转

classRec.name: GPsdBlendMode
classRec.description:
psd blend mode key:
norm' = normal 'dark' = darken 'lite' = lighten
hue ' = hue 'sat ' = saturation 'colr' = color
lum ' = luminosity 'mul ' = multiply 'scrn' = screen
diss' = dissolve 'over' = overlay 'hLit' = hard light 'sLit' = soft light
diff' = difference 'smud' = exclusion 'div ' = color dodge 'idiv' = color burn
lbrn' = linear burn, 'lddg' = linear dodge, 'vLit' = vivid light
lLit' = linear light, 'pLit' = pin light, 'hMix' = hard mix
pass' = pass through, 'dkCl' = darker color, 'lgCl' = lighter color
fsub' = subtract, 'fdiv' = divide

classRec.name: GSwfFillStyle
classRec.description:
填充类型
Solid fill 单色填充
Gradient fill 渐变色填充
Bitmap fill 位图填充
classRec.author: bright

method.name: decodeTags
method.description: 如果Swf标签被过滤将不进行解码

method.name: parseSectionDivider
method.description:
Section divider setting (Photoshop 6.0)
4字节 类型. 4个合理的值
0=图层
1=文件夹-打开
2=文件夹-关闭
3=边界,在界面中不显示
4字节 签名 8BIM
4字节 混合模式

classRec.name: GDepthSort
classRec.description: GDepthSort 快速深度排序(二分算法优化)
classRec.author: bright

method.name: add
method.description: add 使用二分插入显示对象

method.name: reset
method.description: reset 使用二分查找重置深度
